author:
Opentrons
Opentrons has launched a new Protocol Library. This page won’t be available after January 31st, 2024. Submit a request to add this protocol to the new library.
description: This protocols performs a blead cleanup on the OT-2 with overnight digestion step for 16, 32, or 48 samples. For detailed description of requirements and steps, please see below.
labware:
TMTpro18 PCR strip plate #72.985.002
NEST 96 Well Plate 100 µL PCR Full Skirt #402501
Opentrons 24 Tube Rack with Eppendorf 2 mL Safe-Lock Snapcap
Opentrons 96 Tip Rack 300 µL
NEST 12 Well Reservoir 15 mL #360102
Opentrons 96 Tip Rack 20 µL
NEST 1 Well Reservoir 195 mL #360103

markdown.author:
[Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)



# Opentrons has launched a new Protocol Library. This page won’t be available after January 31st, 2024. [Submit a request](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdYYp9QCKow4nn0KlCVsMS3HX0eJ0N9O7-erajKvcpT0lWbSg/viewform) to add this protocol to the new library.
markdown.description: This protocols performs a blead cleanup on the OT-2 with overnight digestion step for 16, 32, or 48 samples. For detailed description of requirements and steps, please see below.
markdown.labware:
* TMTpro18 PCR strip plate #72.985.002
* [NEST 96 Well Plate 100 µL PCR Full Skirt #402501](http://www.cell-nest.com/page94?_l=en&product_id=97&product_category=96)
* [Opentrons 24 Tube Rack with Eppendorf 2 mL Safe-Lock Snapcap](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips/products/tube-rack-set-1)
* [Opentrons 96 Tip Rack 300 µL](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips/products/opentrons-300ul-tips)
* [NEST 12 Well Reservoir 15 mL #360102](http://www.cell-nest.com/page94?_l=en&product_id=102)
* [Opentrons 96 Tip Rack 20 µL](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips/products/opentrons-10ul-tips)
* [NEST 1 Well Reservoir 195 mL #360103](http://www.cell-nest.com/page94?_l=en&product_id=102)
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the [Troubleshooting Survey](https://protocol-troubleshooting.paperform.co/).
markdown.pipettes:
* [Opentrons P20 Single Channel Electronic Pipette (GEN2)](https://shop.opentrons.com/single-channel-electronic-pipette-p20/)
* [Opentrons P300 8 Channel Electronic Pipette (GEN2)](https://shop.opentrons.com/8-channel-electronic-pipette/)
markdown.process:
1. Input your protocol parameters above.
2. Download your protocol and unzip if needed.
3. Upload your custom labware to the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app) by navigating to `More` > `Custom Labware` > `Add Labware`, and selecting your labware files (.json extensions) if needed.
4. Upload your protocol file (.py extension) to the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app) in the `Protocol` tab.
5. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
6. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support articles](https://support.opentrons.com/en/collections/1559720-guide-for-getting-started-with-the-ot-2).
7. Hit "Run".
markdown.protocol-steps:
1. 12 well reservoir (liquid stock plate) contains: A1= 100% ACN, A2= 70% ethanol
2. Eppendorf rack (liquid stock epps) contains: A1= bead solution, A2= 200 mM TEAB, A3= 5% HA, A4= 20% formic acid
3. Homogenize bead solution in A1 of Eppendorf rack (50 µl 3x, fast speed)
4. 4 µl beads from A1 to column 1-6* of slot 1 (same tips)
5. 30 µl of sample from column 1-6* slot 2 to column 1-6* slot 1 (A1 to A1, B2 to B2 etc, new tip always)
6. 70 µl of 100% ACN to column 1-6* of slot 1 (airgap, mix after every time, 3x low speed, new tip always)
7. Wait 2 mins
8. Engage magnetic module (magnetic beads as low as possible)
9. Wait 5 mins
10. Remove 100 µl from column 1-6* of slot 1, dispose in reservoir slot 11 (Consolidate, same tips)
11. Add 100 µl 70% ethanol to column 1-6* of slot 1 (one tip)
12. Remove 100 µl from column 1-6* of slot 1, dispose in reservoir slot 11 (Consolidate, same tips)
13. Repeat step 11-12
14. Disengage magnetic module
15. Wait 2 mins
16. Add 10 µl digestion solution to column 1-6* slot 1 (mix every time, 1x slowly, new tip always)
17. Pause protocol (‘move sample plate to heater shaker’)
18. Close HS module
19. Heater activate (37°C)
20. Pause protocol (‘Overnight digestion’)
21. Deactivate heater
22. Open HS module
23. Pause protocol (‘move sample plate to magnetic mod’)
24. Engage magnetic module (magnetic beads as low as possible)
25. Wait 2 mins
26. Move 10 µl from column 1-6* of slot 1 to new position in the same plate, according to the ‘sample transfer layout’ scheme attached (new tips always, low speed aspirate, away from mag beads, touch tip after dispense)
27. Add 5µl 200 mM TEAB to all TMT wells (new tip always, mix 3x)
28. Add 9 µl TMT/buffer mix from slot 9 to all samples**, according to the attached scheme ‘TMT layout’ (A1 -> A3, A5 or A7, B1 -> B3, B5 or B7 etc., new tip always, mix 3x low speed)
29. Wait 1 hr
30. Add 5 µl 5% HA to all samples** (new tip always, mix every time, 1x medium speed)
31. Wait 15 mins
32. Consolidate samples into one Eppendorf (B5-8 of slot 3), every two columns of samples combined into one epp (for triplos: column 7 + 8 from sample plate to B5 of slot 3, column 9 + 10 to B6 of slot 3, column 11 + 12 to B7, for monoplo: column 3 + 4 to B5)
33. Add 10 µl 20% formic acid to slots B5-8* of slot 3 (new tip always, mix after every time 3x high speed)
markdown.title: Digestion and Bead Cleanup

notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the Troubleshooting Survey.
pipettes:
Opentrons P20 Single Channel Electronic Pipette (GEN2)
Opentrons P300 8 Channel Electronic Pipette (GEN2)
process:
Input your protocol parameters above.
Download your protocol and unzip if needed.
Upload your custom labware to the OT App by navigating to More > Custom Labware > Add Labware, and selecting your labware files (.json extensions) if needed.
Upload your protocol file (.py extension) to the OT App in the Protocol tab.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support articles.
Hit "Run".
protocol-steps:
12 well reservoir (liquid stock plate) contains: A1= 100% ACN, A2= 70% ethanol
Eppendorf rack (liquid stock epps) contains: A1= bead solution, A2= 200 mM TEAB, A3= 5% HA, A4= 20% formic acid
Homogenize bead solution in A1 of Eppendorf rack (50 µl 3x, fast speed)
4 µl beads from A1 to column 1-6* of slot 1 (same tips)
30 µl of sample from column 1-6 slot 2 to column 1-6 slot 1 (A1 to A1, B2 to B2 etc, new tip always)
70 µl of 100% ACN to column 1-6* of slot 1 (airgap, mix after every time, 3x low speed, new tip always)
Wait 2 mins
Engage magnetic module (magnetic beads as low as possible)
Wait 5 mins
Remove 100 µl from column 1-6* of slot 1, dispose in reservoir slot 11 (Consolidate, same tips)
Add 100 µl 70% ethanol to column 1-6* of slot 1 (one tip)
Remove 100 µl from column 1-6* of slot 1, dispose in reservoir slot 11 (Consolidate, same tips)
Repeat step 11-12
Disengage magnetic module
Wait 2 mins
Add 10 µl digestion solution to column 1-6* slot 1 (mix every time, 1x slowly, new tip always)
Pause protocol (‘move sample plate to heater shaker’)
Close HS module
Heater activate (37°C)
Pause protocol (‘Overnight digestion’)
Deactivate heater
Open HS module
Pause protocol (‘move sample plate to magnetic mod’)
Engage magnetic module (magnetic beads as low as possible)
Wait 2 mins
Move 10 µl from column 1-6* of slot 1 to new position in the same plate, according to the ‘sample transfer layout’ scheme attached (new tips always, low speed aspirate, away from mag beads, touch tip after dispense)
Add 5µl 200 mM TEAB to all TMT wells (new tip always, mix 3x)
Add 9 µl TMT/buffer mix from slot 9 to all samples**, according to the attached scheme ‘TMT layout’ (A1 -> A3, A5 or A7, B1 -> B3, B5 or B7 etc., new tip always, mix 3x low speed)
Wait 1 hr
Add 5 µl 5% HA to all samples** (new tip always, mix every time, 1x medium speed)
Wait 15 mins
Consolidate samples into one Eppendorf (B5-8 of slot 3), every two columns of samples combined into one epp (for triplos: column 7 + 8 from sample plate to B5 of slot 3, column 9 + 10 to B6 of slot 3, column 11 + 12 to B7, for monoplo: column 3 + 4 to B5)
Add 10 µl 20% formic acid to slots B5-8* of slot 3 (new tip always, mix after every time 3x high speed)
title: Digestion and Bead Cleanup
